channel.title: WebP Cloud Services Docs
channel.description: Recent content on WebP Cloud Services Docs

item.title: Gravatar Usage Examples
item.description: Gravatar Usage Examples # Wordpress # Edit your theme, and add the following code inside the functions.php: function use_webp_public_service($avatar) { $avatar = str_replace(array("www.gravatar.com", "0.gravatar.com", "1.gravatar.com", "2.gravatar.com"), "gravatar.webp.se", $avatar); return $avatar; } add_filter('get_avatar', 'use_webp_public_service'); like this:
